data.title: JVM Crash when calling dispose() on an OrthogonalTiledMapRenderer
data.body:
Please ensure you have given all the following requested information in your report.

#### Issue details
When I try and close my game using the following code:

` @Override
        public boolean keyDown(int keycode) {
            if (keycode == Input.Keys.ESCAPE) {
                GameScreen.this.dispose();
                Gdx.app.exit();
            }
return false;
}`

I get the following error:

`#

 # SIGSEGV (0xb) at pc=0x00007fdffccb434d, pid=1606, tid=0x00007fdfbf6fd700
